ComicInfo.Summary:
The are DV8! Bliss, Copycat, Evo, Frostbite, Powerhaus, Sublime and Threshold - writer Warren Ellis created this hardcore super teen team of anti-heroes as a counterpoint to the lighthearted young super hero teams so prevalent in comics!
The team is attacked in its residence of New York...
Frostbite, Bliss and Copycat are separated from the others, but succeed in taking) out there.
Sideways Bob re-knows his opponent the members of the I.O there and evacuate the rest of the team, thinking of the other deaths, thus abandoning Ivanna in spite of him.
The I.O. made a success partially of its mission: they detain Ivana Ba√Øul.
